attributes.action: place a curfew on under 18's in residential areas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To prevent unsocial behaviour I would like to see a curfew of 7.30 for under 10's and 10.30 for under 18's who are on our streets without a valid reason,with police able to return youngsters back home with a written warning.
